answers.answer: Hello mike0564,I do understand your  concern. Renal cyst would not have any problem with your sexual performance. Remove your anxiety and be confident.Best

Hi, renal cyst is not reported to affect sex life but stress or depression because of pain or other cause do affect libido. How old are you and do you have history of diabetes?Try anti anxiety medication or meditation for a week or so and if no improvement is seen do consult doctor.

question: i just found out that i have some small renal cysts around my kidneys and would like to know if this has anything to do with me having a hard time staying up during sex?
title: renal cyst and possibility of this interfering with my sex life
